title: Asterisk
content:
A typographic symbol in the form of a star\*, occupying space between the [baseline](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016013416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/baseline) and [ascender](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016013416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ascender) height, used as a reference mark for a [footnote](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016013416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Footnote) or [endnote](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016013416/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Endnote), as illustrated by this example for the word "star" in the first line of text.

\* usually five-pointed or six-pointed
author: James Arboghast
